vivae.ros.simulator.engine.impl

Class VivaeSimulatorOne

  • java.lang.Object
    • vivae.ros.simulator.engine.impl.VivaeSimulatorOne
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AgentRegisteringSimulation, Simulation, ExternalSimulation

    public class VivaeSimulatorOne
extends java.lang.Object
implements AgentRegisteringSimulation
    Starts with empty list of agents, agents can be added from external source. Each agent can be controlled across the ROS network. Basic workflow: -start SimulatorServer -request loading the map -add agents -start simulation -stop the simulation -destroy the resources
